alert.note: Alert for Greer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 2:49PM CDT until April 09 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Mangum, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mangum and Hester. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
